title: New Employee Onboarding
description: An IAM analyst must provision a new account and access for a new employee starting in the marketing department.

tasks.description: Receive the new hire request from HR, including the user's name, title, and department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly processes the new hire ticket.

tasks.description: Create a new user account in Active Directory based on the corporate naming convention.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully creates the user account.

tasks.description: Assign the user to the 'Marketing' security group, which automatically grants them access to the required folders and applications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst assigns the correct role-based access, following the principle of least privilege.
